mapper.insert: insert into TBL_SELF_CHECK_TASK ( TASK_NO, START_DATE, END_DATE, CHECK_TYPE, STATUS, FAILURE_NUM, SUCCESS_ACCOUNT_NUM, CREATE_DATE, REMARK ) values ( #{taskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checkType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=com.esinotrans.payment.account.enums.SelfCheckTaskStatusEnum}, #{failureNum,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{successAccountNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
